sentences.en: Aerobic exercise helps to build up stamina.
sentences.cn: 有氧健身操有助于增强耐力.

sentences.en: At the summit the stamina and valor of our fighter pilots remained unconquerable and supreme.
sentences.cn: 最突出的是,我们的战斗机飞行员们始终保持着不可战胜的最大的毅力和勇气.

sentences.en: At the summit the stamina and valour of our fighter pilots remained unconquerable and supreme.
sentences.cn: 最突出的是,我们的战斗机驾驶员们始终保持着不屈不挠的最大的毅力和勇气.

sentences.en: But what it lacks in speed it gains in stamina.
sentences.cn: 它虽然行动缓慢,但却很有耐力.

sentences.en: Elaine has the stamina and the determination to succeed.
sentences.cn: 伊莱恩具有成功所需的毅力和决心。

sentences.en: Emma Walton had to call on all her reserves of stamina to win the 10 000 metres.
sentences.cn: 埃玛·沃尔顿不得不动用她所贮备的全部耐力来赢得一万米赛跑.

sentences.en: Giving up smoking had a magical effect on his stamina.
sentences.cn: 戒烟神奇地增强了他的体力.

sentences.en: He was a man of stupendous stamina and energy.
sentences.cn: 他是个有着超强耐力、精力充沛的人。

sentences.en: It takes a lot of stamina to run a marathon.
sentences.cn: 跑马拉松需要很大的耐力。

sentences.en: It was a good illustration of the stamina required to deal with Soviet diplomacy.
sentences.cn: 这充分说明了在外交上同苏联打交道是很需要些耐力的.

sentences.en: The Russian people do impress me with their stamina, patriotism, and sheer numbers.
sentences.cn: 俄国人的干劲 、 爱国热情和人多势众倒确实给我留下了深刻印象.

sentences.en: The stamina of women had always amazed Scobie.
sentences.cn: 妇女们忍受磨难的能力永远使斯考比感到惊异.

sentences.en: You get good lines, perhaps, but no stamina.
sentences.cn: 外表也许不错, 但精气神儿就不行了.

sentences.en: You have to have a lot of stamina to be a top-class dancer.
sentences.cn: 你必须有很强的毅力才能成为一流的舞蹈演员。

sentences.en: You need stamina to be a long-distance runner.
sentences.cn: 当长跑运动员需要耐力。

trans.tran_cn: 体力，耐力，持久力，雄蕊( stamen的名词复数)，毅力，恒劲
trans.tran_en: physical or mental strength that lets you continue doing something for a long time without getting tired
